sprite

Class NullImg

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprite.Img
      • sprite.NullImg

  • public class NullImg
extends Img
    An empty image that returns nothing for getSlide. The purpose of this image is to allow the drawing of images without checking whether an object has an image or not.
    Author:
    Brian Nakayama

    • Method Summary

      • getRotatedInstance

        public Img getRotatedInstance(int degree)
        Description copied from class: Img
        Creates a copy of the image rotated by the specified number of degrees. Instead of rotating an image on the fly this method can be used to pre-rotate images.
        Specified by:
        getRotatedInstance in class Img
        Parameters:
        degree - The amount to rotate out of 360 degrees
        Returns:
        A rotated copy.
